00012 RampUnit::RampUnit(const char* rampName, RampUnitCallback aCallbackMethod, void *aBaton)
00013         : TTObject(rampName), startValue(NULL), targetValue(NULL), currentValue(NULL), normalizedValue(0.0), numValues(0), functionUnit(NULL)
00014 {
00015         callback = aCallbackMethod;
00016         baton = aBaton;
00017         setNumValues(1);
00018         currentValue[0] = 0.0;
00019         targetValue[0] = 0.0;
00020         startValue[0] = 0.0;
00021 
00022         registerAttribute(TT("function"),       kTypeSymbol,    &attrFunction,  (TTSetterMethod)&RampUnit::setFunction);
00023         
00024         //registerMessage(TT("getFunctionParameterNames"), (TTMethod)&RampUnit::getFunctionParameterNames);
00025         //registerMessage(TT("setFunctionParameterValue"), (TTMethod)&RampUnit::setFunctionParameterValue);
00026         //registerMessage(TT("getFunctionParameterValue"), (TTMethod)&RampUnit::getFunctionParameterValue);
00027         
00028         setAttributeValue(TT("function"), TT("linear"));
00029 }
00030 
00031 
00032 RampUnit::~RampUnit()
00033 {
00034         delete functionUnit;
00035         free(currentValue);
00036         free(targetValue);
00037         free(startValue);
00038 }
00039 
00040 
00041 void RampUnit::set(TTUInt32 newNumValues, TTFloat64 *newValues)
00042 {
00043         short i;
00044         
00045         stop();
00046         setNumValues(newNumValues);
00047         for(i=0; i<newNumValues; i++)
00048                 currentValue[i] = newValues[i];
00049 }
00050 
00051 
00052 TTErr RampUnit::setFunction(const TTValue& functionName)
00053 {
00054         attrFunction = functionName;
00055         return FunctionLib::createUnit(attrFunction, &functionUnit);
00056 }

00059 TTErr RampUnit::getFunctionParameterNames(TTSymbol& parameterName, TTValue& names)
00060 {
00061         functionUnit->getAttributeNames(names);
00062         return kTTErrNone;
00063 }

00066 TTErr RampUnit::setFunctionParameterValue(TTSymbol& parameterName, const TTValue& newValue)
00067 {

00069         return kTTErrNone;
00070 }

00072 
00073 TTErr RampUnit::getFunctionParameterValue(TTSymbol& parameterName, TTValue& value)
00074 {
00075         functionUnit->getAttributeValue(parameterName, value);
00076         return kTTErrNone;

00079 
00080 void RampUnit::setNumValues(TTUInt32 newNumValues)
00081 {
00082         if(newNumValues != numValues){
00083                 if(numValues == 0){
00084                         currentValue = (TTFloat64*)malloc(newNumValues * sizeof(double));
00085                         targetValue = (TTFloat64*)malloc(newNumValues * sizeof(double));
00086                         startValue = (TTFloat64*)malloc(newNumValues * sizeof(double));
00087                 }
00088                 else{
00089                         currentValue = (TTFloat64*)realloc(currentValue, newNumValues * sizeof(double));
00090                         targetValue = (TTFloat64*)realloc(targetValue, newNumValues * sizeof(double));
00091                         startValue = (TTFloat64*)realloc(startValue, newNumValues * sizeof(double));
00092                 }
00093                 numValues = newNumValues;
00094         }
00095         sendMessage(TT("numValuesChanged"));    // Notify sub-classes (if they respond to this message)
00096 }

00100         RampLib
00101  ***************************************************************************/
00102 
00103 #include "AsyncRamp.h"
00104 #include "NoneRamp.h"
00105 #include "QueueRamp.h"
00106 #include "SchedulerRamp.h"
00107 
00108 
00109 JamomaError RampLib::createUnit(const TTSymbol& unitName, RampUnit **unit, RampUnitCallback callback, void* baton)
00110 {
00111         if(*unit)
00112                 delete *unit;
00113 
00114         // These should be alphabetized
00115         if(unitName == TT("async"))
00116                 *unit = (RampUnit*) new AsyncRamp(callback, baton);
00117         else if(unitName == TT("none"))
00118                 *unit = (RampUnit*) new NoneRamp(callback, baton);
00119         else if(unitName == TT("queue"))
00120                 *unit = (RampUnit*) new QueueRamp(callback, baton);
00121         else if(unitName == TT("scheduler"))
00122                 *unit = (RampUnit*) new SchedulerRamp(callback, baton);
00123         else {
00124                 // Invalid function specified default to linear
00125                 TTLogError("rampLib: Invalid rampUnit: %s", (char*)unitName);
00126                 *unit = (RampUnit*) new NoneRamp(callback, baton);
00127         }
00128         return JAMOMA_ERR_NONE;
00129 }
00130 
00131 
00132 void RampLib::getUnitNames(TTValue& unitNames)
00133 {
00134         unitNames.clear();
00135         unitNames.append(TT("async"));
00136         unitNames.append(TT("none"));
00137         unitNames.append(TT("queue"));
00138         unitNames.append(TT("scheduler"));
00139 }
